chapters.title: Chapter 27:  A Plain Wooden Box
chapters.info:
Adrielle,
      p. 583â€”Aes Sedai of
      the Gray Ajah, bonded via the Warder-like Asha'man wife bond to
      Kurin.  She is very plain.  They are very
      affectionate to each other despite her plainness, his gray hair, and
      the fact that she was bonded against her will.  She is much taller than
      he.
